channel.title: My webclient/website
channel.description:
erm i am trying to make a webclient but all the free webhosters i have tried wont let me i found 1 that works but when i upload the .jar file it gets an internet explorer cannot display this webpage
anyone know a free webhoster that will let me make one please post in reply thank you for any help given :D
